spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rath is an 11th-level spellcaster who uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Rath has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Rath has a {@item staff of fire}, and scrolls of {@spell dimension door}, {@spell feather fall}, and {@spell fireball}.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Illusory Self (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When a creature Rath can see makes an attack roll against him, he can interpose an illusory duplicate between the attacker and him. The attack automatically misses Rath, then the illusion dissipates.
